description.@en: It’s difficult to be discovered if you’re keeping to yourself and moving among the crowds.

data.notes:
Mage Trait

Professions of this Archetype make use of strange healing arts, plumb the depths of the supernatural and study Spells. They come from all walks of life and have sacrificed some part of their humanity to further their aims.

effect.@en: When moving through crowded urban areas, you leave no trace of your passing and cannot be found with Skills or Spells.
